casebody.data:
Amelia Constantinople, Executrix (Estate of Joseph Constantinople), et al. v. St. John Vianney Church (12954)

O’Connell, Foti and Lavery, Js.

Submitted on briefs September 16 decision released October 4, 1994 *905Roger B. Calistro and Cynthia C. Bott filed a brief for the appellant (named plaintiff). Mark R. Cramer filed a brief for the appellee (defendant). Per Curiam.

The judgment is affirmed.
